start.text: You wake up in a dim corridor of the Communiverse embassy. An alarm blares.

control_room.text: The control room is locked. A keypad blinks.

storage.text: Storage is dark, but you find a glowing crate.

hack.text: The door opens quietly. Inside, you see the navigation console.

force.text: You slam the door. Noise echoes; guards approach.

sneak.text: You sneak to the hangar; a shuttle is prepping.

earth.text: Course locked to Earth. The ship jumps to safety. You win!

distress.text: The signal is sent. Allies arrive and secure the embassy.

fight.text: You are overwhelmed by guards. Captured.

surrender.text: They detain you but later release you; the threat passes. Partial success.

shuttle.text: You board and escape as alarms ring. Success!

sabotage.text: Engines explode; youâ€™re caught in the blast. Fail.
